Description:
About the Company:BestinBrands is the leading authorized distributor of more than 100 brands in Bangladesh across 3 categories:Luxury beauty categories (fragrances, skincare, and make up) working with all the major beauty groups including LVMH, L’Oreal, Estee Lauder, COTY, Interparfums, PUIG, Shiseido, and Clarins
Food & Beverage : Haribo, Barilla, Maille
Toys: Lego, Crayola, Elmer’sBestinBrands is specialized in distributing, marketing and developing international brands in Bangladesh with a proven track record since 2000. The mission of BestinBrands is to connect Bangladeshi consumers to international brands by constantly diversifying and curating new brands and products.We have a workforce of 200 persons based in Dhaka (including 30 persons under the marketing team), a team based in Singapore is composed of around 12 persons and a team in Dubai of 6 people.As the brands portfolio is growing, we are looking for a Brand Manager based in Dubai to take over some brand management.BRAND MANAGERMain responsibilitiesReporting to the Marketing Director, the Brand Manager is responsible for a group of brands. He or she makes the link between the international brand principals and the local brand team based in Bangladesh.Duties and responsibilitiesBrand managementBuild and implement the yearly brand marketing plans and follow the A&P budget
Design presentations and marketing reports to share with the brands
Prepare pitch book for new potential brands (marketing section of the business plan)Operational marketingBuild and implement the 360 launch plans for new brands/product launches
Oversee the execution of all the marketing activities (ABT and BTL) and ensure the local team has the necessary brand assets to execute on time, with high standards and in line with the guidelines
Coordinate and follow up the training activities with the training team
Analyse the performance of the marketing activities and define appropriate KPIMarketing researchConduct some ad-hoc marketing analysis
Analyse consumers trends and expectations according to different categories and needs (beauty, F&B, toys, sport, home...) and identify some gasps for new brand opportunityCorporate Training and marketingBring some support to the training team to design some modules for the corporate training program
Participate in writing some content for the revamping of the BestinBrands websiteSkills
Skills:
Minimum bachelor’s degree in marketing or business
At least 3 years of experience in brand management
Previous experience in the beauty/luxury/FMCG industries is an advantage
A team player with a positive attitude
Highly organized with strong ability to multi-task
Problem solving, efficient time management skills and able to work independently
Creative, meticulous with an eye for details and aesthetics
Able to work in a multi-cultural environment
Proficiency in English, both written and spoken
Strong computer skills including PowerPoint, Word, Excel.
